00045 ////!< readOn

00047 
00048 Entree& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_CoviMAC_Face::readOn(Entree& s)
00049 {
00050   Perte_Charge_Singuliere::lire_donnees(s);
00051   remplir_num_faces(s);
00052   if (regul_) //fichier de sortie si regulation
00053     {
00054       bilan().resize(3); //K deb cible
00055       set_fichier(Nom("K_") + identifiant_);
00056       set_description(Nom("Regulation du Ksing de la surface ") + identifiant_ + "\nt K deb cible");
00057     }
00058   return s;
00059 }

00069 
00070 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_CoviMAC_Face::remplir_num_faces(Entree& s)
00071 {
00072   const Domaine& le_domaine = equation().probleme().domaine();
00073   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone_CoviMAC = ref_cast(Zone_CoviMAC,equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00074   int taille_bloc = zone_CoviMAC.nb_elem();
00075   num_faces.resize(taille_bloc);
00076   lire_surfaces(s,le_domaine,zone_CoviMAC,num_faces, sgn);
00077 // int nfac_tot = mp_sum(num_faces.size());
00078   int nfac_max = (int)mp_max(num_faces.size()); //!< not to count several (number of processes) times the same face
00079 
00080   if(je_suis_maitre() && nfac_max == 0)
00081     {
00082       Cerr << "Error when defining the surface plane for the singular porosity :" << finl;
00083       Cerr << "No mesh faces has been found for the surface plane." << finl;
00084       Cerr << "Check the coordinate of the surface plane which should match mesh coordinates." << finl;
00085       exit();
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_CoviMAC_Face::ajouter_blocs(matrices_t matrices, DoubleTab& secmem, const tabs_t& semi_impl) const
00090 {
00091   const Zone_CoviMAC& zone = la_zone_CoviMAC.valeur();
00092 // const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_CoviMAC.volumes_entrelaces();
00093   const DoubleVect& pf = zone.porosite_face(), &fs = zone.face_surfaces();
00094   const Pb_Multiphase *pbm = sub_type(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()) ? &ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, equation().probleme()) : NULL;
00095   const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs(), &nf = zone.face_normales(),
00096                    *alpha = pbm ? &pbm->eq_masse.inconnue().passe() : NULL, *a_r = pbm ? &pbm->eq_masse.champ_conserve().passe() : NULL,
00097                     &mu_f = ref_cast(Op_Grad_CoviMAC_Face, ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std, equation()).operateur_gradient().valeur()).mu_f();
00098   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &fcl = ref_cast(Champ_Face_CoviMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur()).fcl();
00099   const std::string& nom_inco = equation().inconnue().le_nom().getString();
00100   Matrice_Morse *mat = matrices.count(nom_inco) ? matrices.at(nom_inco) : NULL;
00101   int i, j, e, f, n, N = equation().inconnue().valeurs().line_size();
00102   DoubleTrav aar_f(N); //alpha * alpha * rho a chaque face
00103   for (i = 0; i < num_faces.size(); i++) if ((f = num_faces(i)) < zone.nb_faces() && fcl(f, 0) < 2)
00104       {
00105         double fac = (direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? fs(f) : dabs(nf(f,direction_perte_charge()))) * pf(f) * K();
00106         if (pbm) for (aar_f = 0, j = 0; j < 2 && (e = f_e(f, j)) >= 0; j++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) aar_f(n) += mu_f(f, n, j) * (*a_r)(e, n) * (*alpha)(e, n);
00107         else aar_f = 1;
00108         for (n = 0; n < N; n++)  secmem(f, n) -= 0.5 * fac * aar_f(n) * vit(f, n) * dabs(vit(f, n));
00109         if (mat) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) (*mat)(N * f + n, N * f + n) += fac * aar_f(n) * dabs(vit(f, n));
00110       }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_CoviMAC_Face::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00114 {
00115   Perte_Charge_CoviMAC_Face::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00116   update_K(equation(), calculate_Q(equation(), num_faces, sgn), bilan());
00117 }
